ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: Based on an earlier post by John Kim combined with my recent experiences in Unrest I m not so certain this is correct.  In an earlier post last week, John (30+
ygData.messageBody:
Based on an earlier post by John Kim combined with my recent experiences in
Unrest I'm not so certain this is correct. In an earlier post last week,
John (30+ bard) stated that in Unrest festering hags sometimes conned
indifferent to him while invis. I know for a fact festering hags can see me
(22 bard) when I sing Invis (one nuked me for over 350HPs:-). That leads me
to believe that the level of the mob compared to your level has an impact if
they can see through the song (at least in Unrest). Caveat: its possible
the hag that attacked me cast See Invis before she attacked me but I don't
think its safe for me to test that theory at this stage of my career.

Galtin of E'ci

> That's not how it works. Level is not the basis on which a monster
> will see you. In Permafrost, priest-types which include: preacher,
> prelate, priests, mendicants MAY have the ability to see invis.
>
>
